name: Crossroad Inn
description:
This is the demo for Crossroad Inn. A passion project that is looking for testers and feedback in order to make this the game I wish it one day to be.

I'm having a Discord channel for this and any upcoming games. link is here:

https://discord.gg/swFxT6bH

At the moment I'm simply hoping for people to test it and give feedback.

Any money earned for this project will go directly back into it. Future plans include an original soundtrack and full voice acting.

For those wishing to contribute ongoing, I have a patreon:

https://www.patreon.com/random404stuff
